articles.author: Mike Wall
articles.title: European Mars orbiter spies interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS zooming past Red Planet (photos) - Space
articles.description: "Though our Mars orbiters continue to make impressive contributions to Mars science, it's always extra exciting to see them responding to unexpected situations like this one."
articles.content:
A European Mars probe witnessed the interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS' Red Planet flyby last week.
On Oct. 3, 3I/ATLAS
 zoomed within 19 million miles (30 million kilometers) of Mars. The European Space … [+3702 chars]
